description: This file defines the FavoritesProvider class, a state management class for handling favorite item IDs in a Flutter application. It uses ChangeNotifier to notify listeners when the favorites set changes. The class provides methods to toggle, clear, and check favorite IDs.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A state management class for storing and updating a set of favorite IDs, notifying listeners upon changes.

methods.name: favoriteIds
methods.description: Getter for the set of favorite IDs.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if an ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the favorite state of an ID.
